name: Sky Dash-Mission Unseen Premium
description:
Sky Dash is a much waited fast pace game for kids and adults. A perfect Wheel Runner game for kids above nine years of age, it follows an adventure genre, which will give rise to adrenaline rush more than usual. Static blocks and unknown creatures of this Sky Dashing game are there to welcome you in this game and create obstacles. You have to make ways for a clear path to reach your goal and win the game.

Game features:
1. Multiple unseen creatures to unlock
2. Face pacing game with endless excitement
3. Unexpected and unseen missions with a great deal of adrenaline rush
4. Some breath taking views and realistic gameplay
5. New avatars with passing levels
6. Collection of points to fill the point meter and activate booster
7. Booster is equivalent to more power and easy winning streaks

Sky Dash is a perfect Wheel Runner game for 9+ years of kids, who are looking for adventure mixed with thrilling. It target youths from all over the world and even adults in its fascinating list. Sky Dash is known as a fast paced Sky Dashing game with some unseen missions. These unseen missions will add that excitement among players.

In the unseen mission, players will come across holes or gaps, which they have to avoid meeting the target with a quick swipe motion. It makes this a Swipe Action Game too. With progression, players will come across static blocks, appearing as obstacles and making the game even more difficult.

These static blocks of such Sky rush game will start moving on the path to stop players from reaching their goals. With these blocks, you can even experience some breath taking view of such Rolling Sky games, full of creatures, trying hard to stop you from your mission.

Some will generate from your path and others will drop from the sky. Players just need to keep their pace on. It’s a perfect game of mental strength with concentration and great swipe moves like Racing Moto game.

This game comprises of a small path, which will be full of obstacles. Each step makes it even more popular among gamers, as they are not aware of the obstacles beforehand. This game is played in Sky, which changes background as the player moves forward. The game is visually stunning with added adventure with every level the player takes.
It comprises of power booster feature, adding more power to player and let him or her win the challenges easily. By adding power, you are getting close to opening booster feature. The main goal of players is to collect points to fill up the point meter. Once the meter is full, the booster feature is activated.

With new challenges come new surprises and avatars. So, if you are bored with your old avatar and willing to change it to something new, then you have to win the levels proficiently.
